name: MonstroCity: Kaiju at 6 O'Clock!
description:
Quick city builder where at night a giant monster rises out of the sea to destroy your city as you build it. Still a work in progress! 

Created for Kiwi Jam 2017. 

  • Code - Jeong, Mark, Pascal, Rory (ginger), Ian
  • Art - Ben, Rory (not ginger), Vinny, Andrew
  • Music - Hamish
  • Voices - Other amazing people from KiwiJam 2017!
